song.englishname: More Love, More Power / I Can't Get Enough

english.segment1: Oh yeah, We worship You Lord, with all our hearts. We worship You Lord, with all our minds. We worship You Lord, with all our strength. Cause You are God, You are God
english.segment2: Oh, I love You. Oh, I praise You. Oh, I love You. I love You, my Lord. (repeat 2x)
english.segment3: Chorus: And I will worship You with all of my heart. And I will worship You with all of my mind. And I will worship You with all of my strength. Cause You are my Lord. You are my Lord
english.segment4: More love, more power. More of You in my life. (repeat 3x)
english.segment6: More joy, more freedom. More of You in my life. (repeat)
english.segment8: I can't get enough. I can't get enough. I can't get enough of You. (repeat 7x)
english.segment10: I can't get enough. I can't get enough. I can't get enough of You. (repeat 3x)
english.segment11: More love, more power. More of You in my life. (repeat 3x).
